tasks.task: Engaging in food safety practices in a manufacturing facility
subtasks: Recognizing the importance of responsible food production
Observing the evolution of dust prevention techniques to advanced sterilization processes
Noting the phase of the production process being described as visually impressive
Understanding the use of machines in handling product transport via conveyor belts
Observing syrup addition and mixing steps
Witnessing the baking process in a long oven
Noticing the sealing of packaged products by machines
Selecting corn for popcorn production from annual harvests in northeastern China
Appreciating the blend of traditional methods with modern craftsmanship
Promoting healthier and nostalgic popcorn flavors

tasks.task: Harvesting and processing corn for popcorn production
subtasks: Gathering corn from northeastern China once a year
Screening and selecting corn for popcorn quality
Preparing syrup for added to popcorn products

tasks.task: Operating conveyor belts in food production
subtasks: Transporting products through the manufacturing process
Monitoring machine operations for product integrity
Using a long oven to cook popcorn
Ensuring proper sealing of popcorn packages by machinery

tasks.task: Contracting with national brands for responsible food production
subtasks: Aligning with brands committed to ethical manufacturing processes
